Text:
Moation plus is needed for this game.
I loaded it up with out it on and it asked for it.
Dont be fooled by adverts saying its compatiable you do need it.

does NOT work on wii 4.2e + wasabi dx 3.0b

this is exact same as the espalwii version byte-by byte

unscrubbed release WORKS
download cioscrop v3.5 install it to your wii and load it from disk using the disk channel it works for me
